snippet: Daytop Village, one of the oldest and largest drug rehabilitation agencies in New York State, owes more than $33 million to two banks.
abstract: Daytop Village, one of the oldest and largest drug rehabilitation agencies in New York State, files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection.
lead_paragraph: Daytop Village, one of the oldest and largest drug rehabilitation agencies in New York State, owes more than $33 million to two banks.

headline.seo: Drug Rehab Agency Daytop Village Declares Bankruptcy
headline.main: Drug Rehabilitation Agency Files for Bankruptcy Protection
headline.print_headline: Drug Rehabilitation Agency Files for Bankruptcy Protection
